Package com.example.app.service

Interface ProjectService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectServiceImpl
public interface ProjectService
Service interface for managing projects. This interface defines methods for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving projects. It also includes methods for checking project status and managing project officers.

  • Method Summary

    • isActive

      boolean isActive(int projectId) throws IOException
      Check if a project is active. For applicant to apply For officer to register Still, officer can decrement flat count even if project is not active
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project
      Returns:
      true if the project is active, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • createProject

      Project createProject(String projectName, Date applicationOpenDate, Date applicationCloseDate, String neighborhood, int managerId, boolean visibility, Integer officerLimit, Set<Integer> officers, Set<MaritalStatus> groups, Map<FlatType,Integer> flats) throws IOException
      Create a new project. Meant for manager to create a project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      applicationOpenDate - the date when applications open
      applicationCloseDate - the date when applications close
      neighborhood - the neighborhood of the project
      managerId - the ID of the manager
      visibility - the visibility of the project
      officerLimit - the limit of officers
      officers - the set of officer IDs
      groups - the set of marital status groups
      flats - the map of flat types and their counts
      Returns:
      the created project object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • updateProject

      Project updateProject(int projectId, String projectName, Date applicationOpenDate, Date applicationCloseDate, String neighborhood, int managerId, boolean visibility, Set<MaritalStatus> groups, Map<FlatType,Integer> flats) throws IOException
      Update an existing project. Meant for manager to update a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project
      projectName - the name of the project
      applicationOpenDate - the date when applications open
      applicationCloseDate - the date when applications close
      neighborhood - the neighborhood of the project
      managerId - the ID of the manager
      visibility - the visibility of the project
      groups - the set of marital status groups
      flats - the map of flat types and their counts
      Returns:
      the updated project object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project
      flatType - the type of flat
      Returns:
      the updated project object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
